QuestData.Title: Return to Karazhan: Master of the House
QuestData.Description:
Inside the pocket watch is a worn note.
"The next affair will take place in Morgan's Plot, it will cause quite a stir! The following guests will be in attendance:
Lord Ference, his preferred vintage is red. Baroness Millstipe, she will only attend on the promise of cheese. Strange woman. Baron Dreuger, a ravenous soul, any well spiced meat should keep him happy.
As always, I shall ring the bell should I need you.
- Medivh"
QuestData.LogDescription: Collect the listed items and bring them to the cemetery outside Karazhan.

Objectives.Objective: Bring the items to Morgan's Plot
